title: Kafka integration tests fail with latest Mandrel/GraalVM 24.1-dev builds
body:
### Describe the bug

Integration tests fail with:

```
Fatal error: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/jose4j/keys/resolvers/VerificationKeyResolver
	at java.base/java.lang.Class.getDeclaredConstructors0(Native Method)
	at java.base/java.lang.Class.privateGetDeclaredConstructors(Class.java:3621)
	at java.base/java.lang.Class.getDeclaredConstructors(Class.java:2786)
	at org.graalvm.nativeimage.builder/com.oracle.svm.hosted.reflect.ReflectionDataBuilder.lambda$registerAllDeclaredConstructorsQuery$22(ReflectionDataBuilder.java:373)
	at org.graalvm.nativeimage.builder/com.oracle.svm.hosted.reflect.ReflectionDataBuilder.lambda$runConditionalInAnalysisTask$2(ReflectionDataBuilder.java:178)
	at org.graalvm.nativeimage.pointsto/com.oracle.graal.pointsto.util.CompletionExecutor.executeCommand(CompletionExecutor.java:169)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	at org.graalvm.nativeimage.pointsto/com.oracle.graal.pointsto.util.CompletionExecutor.lambda$executeService$0(CompletionExecutor.java:154)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask$RunnableExecuteAction.compute(ForkJoinTask.java:1726)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask$RunnableExecuteAction.compute(ForkJoinTask.java:1717)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask$InterruptibleTask.exec(ForkJoinTask.java:1641)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask.doExec(ForkJoinTask.java:507)
                        0.9s (7.6% of total time) in 38 GCs | Peak RSS: 0.61GB | CPU load: 3.39
========================================================================================================================
Failed generating 'quarkus-integration-test-reactive-messaging-kafka-999-SNAPSHOT-runner' after 10.5s.
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool$WorkQueue.topLevelExec(ForkJoinPool.java:1491)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.scan(ForkJoinPool.java:2073)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.runWorker(ForkJoinPool.java:2035)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinWorkerThread.run(ForkJoinWorkerThread.java:189)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.jose4j.keys.resolvers.VerificationKeyResolver
	at java.base/jdk.internal.loader.BuiltinClassLoader.loadClass(BuiltinClassLoader.java:641)
	at java.base/jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoaders.java:188)
	at java.base/java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:528)
	at org.graalvm.nativeimage.builder/com.oracle.svm.hosted.NativeImageClassLoader.loadClass(NativeImageClassLoader.java:637)
	at java.base/java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:528)
	... 15 more
```

See https://github.com/graalvm/mandrel/actions/runs/7953291640/job/21709626951

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Additional information

The regression is introduced by https://github.com/oracle/graal/commit/dbca2942a8d051fbd2b4c34f368ea74c1c815788
